Patrick Adelberger

I’m a PhD student and university assistant in the Visual Data Science Lab of the Johannes Kepler University Linz, Linz, Austria. My research focuses on interactive visualizations in the biomedical data visualization field. Together with my colleagues, I design and build data analysis tools to support domain experts.

I received my bachelor’s and master’s degrees in Medical Informatics at TU Wien (Technical University of Vienna), Vienna, Austria.

I’m teaching the practical parts of the Visual Analytics, Information Visualization, Explainable AI, and Computer Graphics courses at the Johannes Kepler University.
